OMER I want to point out that Ive followed siteobserver for about as long as Ive been posting on ST I referred him to this company after their 100M runrate report because I know what he looks for and I knew it fit the profile Since Im the one who got him interested in this stock Im also the one who remembers that he sold out and bought back higher This is not intended as a personal attack we are all free to change our minds There is an important lesson of market psychology to be learned here that is why Im sharing since siteobserver is honorable topic of the day in the OMER sub This is not intended as a personal attack or slander We all make mistakes and there are winners like LOXO and other buyout targets siteobserver has found that Im also not including in this cherry picking Be mindful of the timestamps Exhibit 1Show More
